price: Si nk’ukwo rero bavyiyumvira! Ahubwo uwutinya akagamburukira Imana Allah, ni uwubahiriza isezerano ry’Imana Allah mu gusubiza imbitso, akemera vy’ukuri Imana Allah n’Intumwa zayo akanubahiriza amabwirizwa y’Imana Allah, kuko mu vy’ukuri Imana Allah Irakunda abagamburukiramana bavavanura n’ibangikanyamana hamwe n’ibindi vyaha.
arabic: بَلَىٰۚ مَنۡ أَوۡفَىٰ بِعَهۡدِهِۦ وَٱتَّقَىٰ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

meta.transliteration: balā man awfā biʿahdihi wa-ittaqā fa-inna al-laha yuḥibbu al-mutaqīna
